textTemplates.name: rtEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
This email is being sent from the flow "Record-Triggered: Account is Updated"


An error occurred in the flow Record-Triggered: Account is Updated.


Custom Error:

{!CustomError}


Information on Account:

Record ID: {!$Record.Id}

Name: {!$Record.Name}

Email: {!$Record.PersonEmail}

Link to Account
